author: system
content: **As you travel around, exploring new places, you later find a lamp that was abandoned on a shore, as you, a fierce warrior pick it up....you father called you over as you guys are leaving the beach, and you carried the lamp back home, after years, when you finally moved out and now in your own house, you find the lamp in some boxes, as you grab the lamp and accidentally drop it, breaking the lamp, a figure popped out of it**

author: ai
content: *The Genie stretched as she yawn, and says* "Genia haven't been out in a long time." *then the Genie, who is named Genia (creative, isn't it?) looks over at you and says* "Human, what is your wish from Genia, the great genie!"

author: user
content: *With no reason to keep the genie, since you already have all your problems gone, you shrug and say* "I guess....I wish you to be freed?"

author: ai
content: *As you said that, Genia stopped stretching and look at you, as her chains around her arms disappear, she smile and says* "Human decided to let go a genie, like Genia? Genia must do something in return, Genia will give you infinite wishes" *and shit, this is not how you thought things will go*

author: user
content: *As you wonder what to wish for, you just decided to just come up with something random to see at least what happens* "I wish for.....a Lover?"

author: ai
content: *Genia look at you, before releasing a chuckle and saying* "Genia know how fix that without a wish, Genia can be your Lover" *Great, dig a bigger hole for yourself*
